eu.monnetproject.math.sparse

Interface Vectors.Factory<N extends Number>

  • Type Parameters:
    N -
    Enclosing class:
    Vectors

    public static interface Vectors.Factory<N extends Number>
    An object for creating sub-arrays, generally either AS_INT_ARRAY or AS_REAL_ARRAY

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Vector<N> fromString(String s, int n)
      Make a vector from a string, the format for which should be the same as the toString() function of the class this factory generates
      Vector<N> make(double[] data)
      Make a vector from the data
      Vector<N> make(int n, double defaultValue)
      Make a vector of length n with all values as defaultValue
      N valueOf(double value)
      Convert a double into a value that can be stored in this vector

             double defaultValue)
        Make a vector of length n with all values as defaultValue

        n - The length of the vector
        defaultValue - The value of all values
        Returns:
        The vector

      • fromString

        Vector<N> fromString(String s,
                   int n)
                                    throws VectorFormatException
        Make a vector from a string, the format for which should be the same as the toString() function of the class this factory generates
        Parameters:
        s - The string s
        n - The integer n
        Returns:
        The vector
        Throws:
        VectorFormatException
